name: Slug Season
description:
Slug Season is a relaxing take on tower defense and puzzle games where you protect a backyard garden box from slugs that mean to eat your plants.

Each level will present the same challenge: prevent as many slugs as possible from reaching your garden. Of course, where these slugs emerge from will change each level, forcing you to adapt your strategy as levels progress. Additionally, with randomly placed obstacles, each playthrough will be a new challenge.

Features

  • Relaxing aesthetic
  • 10 unique defenses
  • 4 different plants
  • Many possible solutions to each level
  • Procedural slug and rock placement; no two playthroughs are the same

Controls

  • Mostly clicking with mouse
  • To rotate camera, click and drag left/right, or left arrow & right arrow, or A key & D key

If Mac version does not open correctly after downloading, try installing it through the Itch desktop app.
